text: Cerion iostomum is a species of air-breathing tropical land snail, a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Cerionidae. == Distribution == Cuba"Mollusca" . Diversidad Biológica Cubana, accessed 23 March 2011. ==References== == External links == * http://invertebrates.si.edu/Cerion/species.cfm?species=635 Category:Cerionidae Category:Gastropods described in 1854
title: Cerion iostomum
